title: Blue book, 2014
name: Blue book, 2014
lede: The United Kingdom National Accounts Blue Book was first published in August 1952 and presents a full set of economic accounts (National Accounts) for the United Kingdom. These accounts are compiled by the Office for National Statistics (ONS). They record and describe economic activity in the UK and as such are used to support the formulation and monitoring of economic and social policies.
